meta.@content: Defines a prototype of Supercobra AH-1Z helicopter.
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

field.@appinfo: color of tail boom drive shaft
input event indicating that the aircraft is in flight

Viewpoint.@description: helicopter name overridden by protodeclare field

-children.#comment: right, left, bottom, lower front, upper front, top, lower back, upper back

@string: Select Example Helicopter Overall Paint Scheme
